decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those specified in the application  (including the application form and as annotated on the approved plans) and shall be so maintained at all times thereafter.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PHB_07_0001, PHB_07_0010, PHB_07_0020, PHB_07_0030, PHB_07_0040, PHB_07_0041, PHB_07_0300 received on 17/12/2015. PHB_07_0102 rev P2, PHB_07_0102 rev P3,   PHB_07_0400, PHB_07_0401 received on 11/03/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The waste and recycled materials storage arrangements shown on the approved drawing shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.

Condition : 5 - The rooflights hereby approved shall be installed as conservation style rooflights, being flush with the roof pane and finished in a dark colour and shall be so maintained at all times thereafter.

Condition : 6 - No dwelling shall be occupied until the car parking spaces have been provided in accordance with the details on plan reference PHB_07_0010 and one space shall be allocated to each of the flats hereby approved and maintained for this purpose at all times thereafter..

Condition : 7 - No dwelling shall be occupied until the cycle parking has been laid out within the site in accordance with plan reference PHB_07_0010 and this shall be so maintained at all times thereafter.
description: Conversion of existing roof space into two self contained flats, along with external alterations including the erection of dormer windows, insertion of roof lights and  elevational alterations
